name: Amortentia
use_effect: Causes powerful infatuation or obsession in the drinker toward the person who gave it.
instructions: Add Ashwinder eggs to cauldron and heat gently.
Crush rose thorns and add with peppermint while stirring clockwise.
Simmer for 10 minutes.
Add powdered moonstone slowly while chanting the recipient's name.
Finish with pearl dust and stir until a mother-of-pearl sheen appears.
notes: Recognizable by its distinctive aroma, which varies according to what each individual finds most attractive. Not a true love potion; causes obsession.

name: Felix Felicis
use_effect: Grants the drinker extraordinary luck for a period of time.
instructions: Boil squill bulb and horseradish until reduced.
Add powdered Occamy shell and stir rapidly for 3 minutes.
Mix in common rue and heliotrope extract while heating to golden bubble stage.
Cool under starlight for 6 hours.
notes: Overuse causes recklessness and giddiness. Illegal in competitive events such as exams and sports.

name: Veritaserum
use_effect: Forces the drinker to tell the truth.
instructions: Simmer mandrake root and valerian for 30 minutes.
Add finely ground Jobberknoll feathers while stirring counter-clockwise.
Pour in wormwood infusion and boil for 10 minutes.
Finish with a drop of thyme tincture.
notes: Effects can be resisted by strong will or antidotes. Use is restricted by wizarding law.

name: Polyjuice Potion
use_effect: Allows the drinker to assume the form of another person.
ingredients: Piece of person to transform into (e.g., hair)
instructions: Stew lacewing flies and prepare base.
Add leeches and powdered bicorn horn.
Add knotgrass and fluxweed with clockwise stir.
Mix in Boomslang skin and the sample of the target person.
Let brew for 30 days before use.
notes: Complex and dangerous to brew. Transformation only lasts for one hour.

name: Draught of Living Death
use_effect: Puts the drinker into a deep, nearly irreversible sleep.
instructions: Boil wormwood and asphodel for 15 minutes.
Add valerian root and powdered aconite slowly.
Stir until potion turns deep purple.
Add sloth brain and reduce to a low simmer.
notes: Very potent. Antidote required for awakening. Used with extreme caution.

name: Wolfsbane Potion
use_effect: Allows werewolves to retain their minds during a full moon.
instructions: Mix powdered aconite with spring water.
Add silverweed and black pepper.
Boil gently and add mistletoe berries.
Let steep for one hour before cooling and bottling.
notes: Must be taken daily for a week prior to the full moon. Poisonous if brewed incorrectly.

name: Pepperup Potion
use_effect: Cures the common cold and warms up the drinker.
instructions: Crush mandrake and peppercorn together.
Boil with cinnamon until steam curls red.
Add dragon scale and a drop of clove oil.
Bottle while hot and spicy.
notes: May cause steam to emit from ears. Safe for general use.

name: Skele-Gro
use_effect: Regrows lost or removed bones.
instructions: Boil troll marrow and sinew strands for 10 minutes.
Mix in nettles and bone ash.
Add trace of manticore venom carefully.
Stir vigorously until thick white consistency forms.
notes: Very painful. Only administered under medical supervision.

name: Elixir to Induce Euphoria
use_effect: Gives the drinker a feeling of intense happiness.
instructions: Boil sun dew and add dandelion root.
Infuse with giggle petals while humming.
Add orange zest and light essence tincture.
Stir gently with golden spoon for 3 minutes.
notes: Overdose may cause excessive singing or skipping.

name: Wiggenweld Potion
use_effect: Revives those who have been magically unconscious.
instructions: Brew moly and dittany for 20 minutes.
Add unicorn hair and infuse with phoenix feather.
Stir clockwise 7 times.
Mix in honeywater and cool in sunlight.
notes: Used as an antidote to the Draught of Living Death.

name: Baruffio's Brain Elixir
use_effect: Enhances memory, focus, and mental clarity for a limited time.
instructions: Simmer ginkgo and scarab beetle for 15 minutes.
Add rosemary essence and stir clockwise for 6 turns.
Mix in dragon claw and silver thistle oil slowly.
Let potion settle until it turns metallic blue.
notes: Not recommended for extended use. May cause temporary dizziness.

name: Fire Protection Potion
use_effect: Temporarily protects the drinker from fire or extreme heat.
instructions: Heat salamander blood until it bubbles lightly.
Add fire seeds and flameflower nectar.
Stir counter-clockwise and sprinkle crimson salt.
Add powdered ruby and remove from flame immediately.
notes: Effective for about 10 minutes. Do not use near water.

name: Calming Draught
use_effect: Soothes anxiety, panic, or agitation.
instructions: Steep chamomile and lavender for 10 minutes.
Add crushed moon petals and rainwater.
Whisper a calming chant while stirring with the Jobberknoll feather.
Cool under moonlight for 3 hours.
notes: Safe for daily use. Effects fade gradually.

name: Invisibility Draught
use_effect: Temporarily renders the drinker's body transparent or invisible.
instructions: Dissolve chameleon skin in whispering fog essence.
Add unicorn bone powder slowly.
Mix in sap and spiritroot while chanting the obscuring spell.
Let brew under a veil for 6 hours.
notes: May cause dizziness when fading back to visibility. Rare and hard to brew.

name: Blood-Replenishing Potion
use_effect: Restores lost blood and stabilizes the drinker.
instructions: Boil beetroot and mugwort for 10 minutes.
Add diluted dragon blood slowly while stirring.
Drop in hellebore and unicorn marrow last.
Let rest for 15 minutes before bottling.
notes: Used in medical emergencies. Must be administered with care.

name: Truth Mist
use_effect: Causes anyone who inhales it to speak only the truth for a short period.
instructions: Mix fog extract and crystal leaf to form a mist.
Add petals and chant the invocation of clarity.
Mist over hot flame until glowing.
Cool quickly to trap vapors.
notes: Only effective when inhaled, not ingested.

name: Night Vision Elixir
use_effect: Temporarily enhances the drinker's vision in complete darkness.
instructions: Boil bat wing with mushroom essence.
Add feather and chant focus incantation.
Stir 9 times counter-clockwise.
Cool in darkness.
notes: May cause temporary light sensitivity.

name: Stone Skin Tonic
use_effect: Hardens the drinker's skin temporarily for protection.
instructions: Crush granite and dissolve in troll sweat.
Add basilisk scale and bark extract.
Shake vigorously until paste thins to liquid.
Let stand on cold stone overnight.
notes: Can slow movement. Use with caution during duels.

name: Featherlight Brew
use_effect: Temporarily reduces the drinker's weight.
instructions: Mix pixie dust with bark extract.
Infuse with airflower and dandelion oil.
Stir until light as foam.
Seal in floating vial.
notes: Useful for climbing or escaping falls. Avoid strong winds.

name: Tongue-Tying Tonic
use_effect: Temporarily prevents the drinker from speaking clearly or revealing secrets.
instructions: Brew knotgrass and gagweed on low heat.
Add vanishing salt while muttering protection charm.
Drizzle in vine extract and bottle immediately.
Seal with wax sigil.
notes: Used for self-protection against truth potions.

name: Aquafresh Elixir
use_effect: Hydrates the drinker instantly and refreshes the body.
instructions: Grind mermaid scale and mint.
Add glacier ice and stir until melted.
Drop in moonwort oil and shake lightly.
Serve chilled.
notes: Used by Quidditch players and desert travelers.

name: Spark Elixir
use_effect: Energizes the drinker, boosting stamina and alertness.
instructions: Heat phoenix ash until bright red.
Add berries and zaproot.
Sprinkle crystal dust and stir rapidly for 5 minutes.
Cool with icy breath charm.
notes: Can cause hyperactivity. Limit to one dose per day.

name: Frostbite Tonic
use_effect: Grants resistance to cold environments and ice spells.
instructions: Boil frost fern and lichens together.
Add sprite tears slowly.
Drop in mushrooms and stir gently with silver spoon.
Chill overnight in a snow-covered container.
notes: Not effective in magical blizzards.

name: Echo Elixir
use_effect: Allows the drinker to mimic any sound or voice they hear for a short time.
instructions: Mix mimicroot with hollow syrup.
Add parrot feather and stir rhythmically.
Dust with echo crystals and chant 'Imita Voce'.
Bottle in soundproof container.
notes: Duration ~15 minutes. Does not work on musical tones.

name: Veil Draught
use_effect: Allows the drinker to see faint echoes of the past in a specific location.
instructions: Steep shroud moss and ghost orchid petals in warm water for 15 minutes.
Add distilled memory essence drop by drop while whispering the desired time period.
Stir with a wand infused with silver hair, clockwise 13 times.
Mix in wraithleaf extract and moonstone dust simultaneously.
Bottle immediately in a container exposed to moonlight.
notes: Only works in areas with strong residual magic. Visions are brief and silent.
